subject: Java XP Book  covers JUnit was RE: [junit] Starter
msgSnippet: I don t mind hearing about a good book on JUnit....   ;) Rick Hightower Director of Development eBlox, Inc. Check out our new website!

>
> Java Tools for Extreme Programming: Mastering Open Source Tools, including

>
> If you'd like a hard copy tutorial on JUnit.
>

> Nick
